channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: The Morning Show
channel.desc: Wake up to QVC! We've chosen products from across all our ranges to ensure there is something for everyone to enjoy. Tune in to see special guests too.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Prime Fifty Supplements
channel.desc: The Prime Fifty range features nutritional supplements tailored specifically to the needs of the over 50s and beyond, helping you to have the time of your life in the prime of your life.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Cozee Home Sale
channel.desc: Offering everything from snuggly bedding to sumptuous throws, Cozee Home have the perfect pieces to create a sanctuary in your own home - and all at unbeatable, not-to-be-missed prices.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: The Lunchtime Show
channel.desc: Join us and our great panel of guests at lunchtime as they enjoy a chat and share a selection of fantastic products from top brands on QVC.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Up to 50% off MarlaWynne Sale
channel.desc: Transform your wardrobe with up to 50% off in the MarlaWynne Sale at QVC. Discover chic, versatile pieces at amazing prices and elevate your style for less.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Skechers Footwear
channel.desc: Step out in style in Skechers! Renowned for their on-trend, sporty designs, you can now find their fab shoes at QVC too.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Ben de Lisi Sale
channel.desc: Bag yourself some fabulous fashion deals with Ben de Lisi, who offers style staples that encapsulate modern elegance, from stunning dresses to chic separates. Discover what's on offer in this show.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Dyson
channel.desc: Vacuum your home with help from the iconic and much-loved British brand Dyson. We will be showcasing unique packages with added accessories, as well as discovering Dyson's new innovative technology.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Evening Style with Katy
channel.desc: Discover the latest trends from the biggest fashion brands with a little help from QVC presenter, Katy.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Feel Good Beauty with Alison Young
channel.desc: Feel Good Beauty with Alison Young.
